pullrequest.title: updated run/stop button disabled status based on srcsim state

content.raw:
Thanks for the new PR!

How long does it usually take for Stop to take effect for the simulator? It's been a few minutes
content.html:
Thanks for the new PR!

How long does it usually take for Stop to take effect for the simulator? It's been a few minutes

pullrequest.title: updated run/stop button disabled status based on srcsim state

content.raw: You mean, the actual stop , it should be quick , assuming the process does not hang out in the instance. Do you know if the instance is trying to stop ? You can check that by looking at the specific cloudsim-sim:4000/api /simulations rest api .
content.html: You mean, the actual stop , it should be quick , assuming the process does not hang out in the instance. Do you know if the instance is trying to stop ? You can check that by looking at the specific cloudsim-sim:4000/api /simulations rest api .

pullrequest.title: updated run/stop button disabled status based on srcsim state

content.raw:
How do I check that?

I've clicked the Stop button on the UI many minutes ago. These are my docker processes running:

~~~
$ ps aux | grep docker
nvidia-+  1158  0.0  0.1 29659536 20824 ?      Ssl  22:32   0:00 /usr/bin/nvidia-docker-plugin -s /var/lib/nvidia-docker
root      1171  0.2  0.3 613452 46464 ?        Ssl  22:32   0:01 /usr/bin/dockerd -H fd://
root      1398  0.0  0.0 464396 14412 ?        Ssl  22:32   0:00 docker-containerd -l unix:///var/run/docker/libcontainerd/docker-containerd.sock --metrics-interval=0 --start-timeout 2m --state-dir /var/run/docker/libcontainerd/containerd --shim docker-containerd-shim --runtime docker-runc
root      1981  0.0  0.0  19716  3328 ?        S    22:35   0:00 bash /home/ubuntu/code/srcsim_docker/docker/run_container.bash gazebo_run src-cloudsim -v /home/ubuntu/code/gazebo-logs:/home/cloudsim/gazebo-logs -v /home/ubuntu/code/cloudsim-sim:/home/cloudsim/commands --net=host -e ROS_IP=192.168.2.1 -e ROS_MASTER_URI=http://192.168.2.1:11311 --ulimit core=1000000000:1000000000 /home/cloudsim/commands/launch_server.bash
root      1982  0.0  0.0   6016   676 ?        S    22:35   0:00 tee -a /home/ubuntu/code/cloudsim-docker.log
root      2011  0.0  0.1 383656 18664 ?        Sl   22:35   0:00 docker run --name gazebo_run -e DISPLAY=unix:0 -e XAUTHORITY=/tmp/.docker.xauth -v /etc/localtime:/etc/localtime:ro -v /tmp/.X11-unix:/tmp/.X11-unix -v /tmp/.docker.xauth:/tmp/.docker.xauth -v /dev/log:/dev/log --ulimit rtprio=99 -v /home/ubuntu/code/gazebo-logs:/home/cloudsim/gazebo-logs -v /home/ubuntu/code/cloudsim-sim:/home/cloudsim/commands --net=host -e ROS_IP=192.168.2.1 -e ROS_MASTER_URI=http://192.168.2.1:11311 --ulimit core=1000000000:1000000000 --volume-driver=nvidia-docker --volume=nvidia_driver_375.51:/usr/local/nvidia:ro --device=/dev/nvidiactl --device=/dev/nvidia-uvm --device=/dev/nvidia-uvm-tools --device=/dev/nvidia0 src-cloudsim /home/cloudsim/commands/launch_server.bash
root      2075  0.0  0.0 413316  5780 ?        Sl   22:35   0:00 docker-containerd-shim 85de909473c8c6335f09fac08e487a1cfeacbbd2df6fae7661c43bf7701ee810 /var/run/docker/libcontainerd/85de909473c8c6335f09fac08e487a1cfeacbbd2df6fae7661c43bf7701ee810 docker-runc
root      2196  0.0  0.0  60104 15320 ?        Sl   22:35   0:00 docker wait gazebo_run
ubuntu    4919  0.0  0.0  13084  1084 pts/0    S+   22:45   0:00 grep --color=auto docker
~~~
content.html:
How do I check that?

I've clicked the Stop button on the UI many minutes ago. These are my docker processes running:

$ ps aux | grep docker
nvidia-+  1158  0.0  0.1 29659536 20824 ?      Ssl  22:32   0:00 /usr/bin/nvidia-docker-plugin -s /var/lib/nvidia-docker
root      1171  0.2  0.3 613452 46464 ?        Ssl  22:32   0:01 /usr/bin/dockerd -H fd://
root      1398  0.0  0.0 464396 14412 ?        Ssl  22:32   0:00 docker-containerd -l unix:///var/run/docker/libcontainerd/docker-containerd.sock --metrics-interval=0 --start-timeout 2m --state-dir /var/run/docker/libcontainerd/containerd --shim docker-containerd-shim --runtime docker-runc
root      1981  0.0  0.0  19716  3328 ?        S    22:35   0:00 bash /home/ubuntu/code/srcsim_docker/docker/run_container.bash gazebo_run src-cloudsim -v /home/ubuntu/code/gazebo-logs:/home/cloudsim/gazebo-logs -v /home/ubuntu/code/cloudsim-sim:/home/cloudsim/commands --net=host -e ROS_IP=192.168.2.1 -e ROS_MASTER_URI=http://192.168.2.1:11311 --ulimit core=1000000000:1000000000 /home/cloudsim/commands/launch_server.bash
root      1982  0.0  0.0   6016   676 ?        S    22:35   0:00 tee -a /home/ubuntu/code/cloudsim-docker.log
root      2011  0.0  0.1 383656 18664 ?        Sl   22:35   0:00 docker run --name gazebo_run -e DISPLAY=unix:0 -e XAUTHORITY=/tmp/.docker.xauth -v /etc/localtime:/etc/localtime:ro -v /tmp/.X11-unix:/tmp/.X11-unix -v /tmp/.docker.xauth:/tmp/.docker.xauth -v /dev/log:/dev/log --ulimit rtprio=99 -v /home/ubuntu/code/gazebo-logs:/home/cloudsim/gazebo-logs -v /home/ubuntu/code/cloudsim-sim:/home/cloudsim/commands --net=host -e ROS_IP=192.168.2.1 -e ROS_MASTER_URI=http://192.168.2.1:11311 --ulimit core=1000000000:1000000000 --volume-driver=nvidia-docker --volume=nvidia_driver_375.51:/usr/local/nvidia:ro --device=/dev/nvidiactl --device=/dev/nvidia-uvm --device=/dev/nvidia-uvm-tools --device=/dev/nvidia0 src-cloudsim /home/cloudsim/commands/launch_server.bash
root      2075  0.0  0.0 413316  5780 ?        Sl   22:35   0:00 docker-containerd-shim 85de909473c8c6335f09fac08e487a1cfeacbbd2df6fae7661c43bf7701ee810 /var/run/docker/libcontainerd/85de909473c8c6335f09fac08e487a1cfeacbbd2df6fae7661c43bf7701ee810 docker-runc

ubuntu    4919  0.0  0.0  13084  1084 pts/0    S+   22:45   0:00 grep --color=auto docker

content.raw:
can you kill the docker container ? It should stop it.

$ docker kill gazebo_run

can you kill the docker container ? It should stop it.

$ docker kill gazebo_run
